channel.title: Why Am I Getting So Many Captchas?
channel.description:
In Whonix recently I started getting lots of captchas on many web sites where I was getting much fewer before. Sometimes I'm getting them in the same session. These captcha pages have a message like "One More Step" or something like that. I may have updated my version of the Tor browser around the time this started, but I'm not sure about the timing.
Any ideas what could cause a big increase in captchas?

item.title: Why Am I Getting So Many Captchas?
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

this could have many reasons, like your exit node being more “problematic” (this could be resolved by reloading Tor), cloudflare having changed a few aspects of its system, etc. The best way to really prevent these, in my eyes, is still to use a “clean” VPN on the workstation, though this creates a permanent exit relay.

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
item.source: Why Am I Getting So Many Captchas?
